overview:
## Discussion

When you include this key in the options dictionary of the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIApplication/open(_:options:completionHandler:)] method, the method opens the URL only if the URL is a valid universal link and there is an installed app capable of opening that URL. The value of this key is an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSNumber] object containing a Boolean value.

# universalLinksOnly

**Type Property**

URLs must be universal links and have an app configured to open them.

## Declaration

```swift
static let universalLinksOnly: UIApplication.OpenExternalURLOptionsKey
```

## Discussion

When you include this key in the options dictionary of the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIApplication/open(_:options:completionHandler:)] method, the method opens the URL only if the URL is a valid universal link and there is an installed app capable of opening that URL. The value of this key is an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSNumber] object containing a Boolean value.
title: universalLinksOnly
